mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CARD (ID, MEMBER_ID, CARD_NUMBER, CARD_EXPIRE_DATE, CARD_PASSWORD, MEMBER_BIRTH_DATE, CARD_REGISTER_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_CARD.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardExpireDate}, #{cardPassword}, #{memberBirthDate}, #{cardRegisterDate})
mapper.select: SELECT CARD_NUMBER, CARD_EXPIRE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER M, TBL_CARD C WHERE M.ID = C.MEMBER_ID AND M.ID = #{id} ORDER BY C.ID ASC
